automation.Commands.browser_commands module¶

automation.Commands.browser_commands.bot_mitigation(webdriver)[source]¶

performs three optional commands for bot-detection mitigation when getting a site

automation.Commands.browser_commands.browse_website(url, num_links, sleep, visit_id, webdriver, browser_params, manager_params, extension_socket)[source]¶

Calls get_website before visiting <num_links> present on the page.

Note: the site_url in the site_visits table for the links visited will be the site_url of the original page and NOT the url of the links visited.

automation.Commands.browser_commands.close_other_windows(webdriver)[source]¶

close all open pop-up windows and tabs other than the current one

automation.Commands.browser_commands.dump_flash_cookies(start_time, visit_id, webdriver, browser_params, manager_params)[source]¶

Save newly changed Flash LSOs to database

We determine which LSOs to save by the start_time timestamp. This timestamp should be taken prior to calling the get for which creates these changes.

automation.Commands.browser_commands.dump_page_source(visit_id, driver, manager_params, suffix='')[source]¶
automation.Commands.browser_commands.get_website(url, sleep, visit_id, webdriver, browser_params, extension_socket)[source]¶

goes to <url> using the given <webdriver> instance

automation.Commands.browser_commands.recursive_dump_page_source(visit_id, driver, manager_params, suffix='')[source]¶

Dump a compressed html tree for the current page visit

automation.Commands.browser_commands.save_screenshot(visit_id, crawl_id, driver, manager_params, suffix='')[source]¶

Save a screenshot of the current viewport

automation.Commands.browser_commands.screenshot_full_page(visit_id, crawl_id, driver, manager_params, suffix='')[source]¶
automation.Commands.browser_commands.tab_restart_browser(webdriver)[source]¶

kills the current tab and creates a new one to stop traffic

automation.Commands.command_executor module¶

automation.Commands.command_executor.execute_command(command, webdriver, browser_settings, browser_params, manager_params, extension_socket)[source]¶

Executes BrowserManager commands commands are of form (COMMAND, ARG0, ARG1, …)

automation.Commands.profile_commands module¶

automation.Commands.profile_commands.dump_profile(browser_profile_folder, manager_params, browser_params, tar_location, close_webdriver, webdriver=None, browser_settings=None, save_flash=False, compress=False)[source]¶

dumps a browser profile currently stored in <browser_profile_folder> to <tar_location> in which both folders are absolute paths. if <browser_settings> exists they are also saved <save_flash> specifies whether to dump flash files

automation.Commands.profile_commands.load_browser_settings(location)[source]¶

loads the browser settings from a pickled dictionary in <location>

automation.Commands.profile_commands.load_flash_files(browser_params, tar_location)[source]¶

clear old flash cookies and load ones from dump

automation.Commands.profile_commands.load_profile(browser_profile_folder, manager_params, browser_params, tar_location, load_flash=False)[source]¶

loads a zipped cookie-based profile stored in <tar_location> and unzips it to <browser_profile_folder>. This will load whatever profile is in the folder, either full_profile.tar.gz or profile.tar.gz

automation.Commands.profile_commands.save_browser_settings(location, browser_settings)[source]¶

browser_settings stores additional profile config parameters e.g. screen_res, plugin sets, user_agent string

automation.Commands.profile_commands.save_flash_files(browser_params, dump_location, clear=False)[source]¶

save all files from the default flash storage locations clear: sets whether to clear storage locations after backup
